name: Let's Play Interdimensional Catch v2
description:
A more polished version of the game I submitted to the 1 button game jam 2020 with additional content.

Press and hold any button to charge throw, release button to launch the ball. Get it into all the baseball mitts to advance to the next level. 

The beams from the eyes will effect the ball's flight: blue will pull, orange will push, green is high gravity, pink is low gravity, purple is bouncy, and yellow will trap the ball.

Original version: https://gramnitschke.itch.io/lets-play-interdimensional-catch

1 Button Jam 2020: https://itch.io/jam/1-button-jam-2020
